comments.comment:
Well said Sharmini. I'm not in the country now but my thoughts and well wishes are with you. 
I hope we will continue to clean up the mess these politicians have created, starting from today.
Lord Buddha stood up against discrimination many times, yet some of us still support it, while standing cowardly behind self claimed patriotism.
Some of us can read, yet we are failing to understand. 
Some of us want to stand in the path of righteousness, yet fear is  stopping us.
We still fail to understand without our country we won't have our homes and yet we don't fear that. 
This kind Lady is shouting for the support of all ladies and gentlemen. 
Come out and stand with the good people of Lanka before it's too late. 
Looking away and not getting your hands dirty at a time of need is not the way of a good citizen.
comments.author: suranga gunasekera

comments.comment:
Who is this woman? She even cant proper sinhalese. So you do not mind whatever damage Ranil was doing? The bond scam? Selling of Hambantota port n Mattala airport? Giving out hundreds of thousands of acres to foriegners??? Passing very damaging bills in the parliment for money?? Actually Ranil converted the parliment to a gamble court! It was never like this before! The bills he passed so far were damaging our country, nation n our war heroes. He and his clan acted like traitors to this country n people! He increased tax to a level  which people could not bear! He got more loans just for upgrading super luxury life style of he n the clan but not for any development project! He depreciated the rupee to historical low. His foolish financial plans dipped our economy to rock bottom! Not only that his govt was backing up ruthless tiger diaspora n his ministers lied at the Geneva UN meeting against the motherland. They agreed to punish our  brave soldiers who fought to defeat the bloody 30yr old terorrism. Some of the heroes are still imprisoned whilst they set free ruthless terorrists out. He was removing most of the army camps set up in most prominent places n destroyed our intelligence system which is a threat to our national security! Not only that, this idiot was trying to destroy our buddhist culture bringing gay laws to our soil. If President did not throw him out of power, in a minute, he was about ro give away North and East to tamil separatists! 
Its only a bloody traitor who can admire this kind of man or either someonw has swollowed loads of bribes!
comments.author: shiranthi sandanayake
